Branch_Archive.title: Archive Branch
Branch_Archive.sqlexec: update {schema}.branch set branch_sts='ARCHIVE' where branch_id=@branch_id and (({schema}.my_user_is_publisher() = 1) or (branch_id in (select branch_id from {schema}.v_my_branch_access where branch_type='USER' and branch_sts='ACTIVE' and branch_access='RW')))
